text:
Pehli baar summer camp mein pta chla k tu bhi apne hi dept ka hai.
Cards, cricket match, volleyball, hall 2 ki mess ka khraab khana.... Bht yaad ayega.
Athletics ki har treat pe stud launda bn k aata tha.

Vo NH91 wali party, zoo ki yaadein (specially aate time wali bndi), Ganga bairaaj ki training, z-square ki movie..... Kitna enjoy kiya bhai.

Dance bht achha karta hai tu.  Jo OAT mein kiya vo yaad hi hoga. 

Fir tum baap ban gye. Chaapna start kar diya. Fir course mein chaapna aur exam ke time vahi randi Rona.... LoL
Labs mein bht fraud maarta tha tu. 
Library mein distractions bht hoti thi bhai ko. Har Baar soya hua dikhta tha bc.

Jab end sem aaye to neend staaye,
Fir doaa aur CC canteen ki taraf....
hum ne apne kadam bdaaye,
vo pal abb bas yaadein hi hai,
Kya karu.... aankh pani se nam ho jaye.

Abb ye mat bolna ki meri shayari achhi nhi BC... Pta hai mujhe ðŸ˜‚
Chal abb thoda hass bhi le.

Tumne chaapna nhi chhoda aur bn gye SOCE coordinator.

Aur fir tumhari life mein kusum aa gyi. Bas thoda sa farak tha ki UPSC tu nhi vo de rhi thi.
Jab bhi ghoomne ke liye bolo to BC busy hota tha.... As expected. XD

Aur jaate jaate treat nhi de k gya.... Andha paisa la k bhaag gya... Kutte.
Russian se jyada Assamee pasanad hai launde ko. Chal abb to tere paas Kusum hai.

Fir milenge chalte chalte.... G**ndu...
I repeat...  G**ndu. Party pending...
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text: Chaapu girl doing lot of RR everytime we metðŸ˜‚
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
Remember the first day I came to your room.... Sab saaaf saaf.... Ek dum chaka chak. Hello bhai... kaha se ho.... Mai badai.... From jalandhar. I got excited, ye to apne ghar ka hi bnda haiðŸ˜‚.
Tab ye safai itni ajeeb nhi lgi. Pehla din tha. Aur hum ko to safai ki aadat thi. Par ye nhi pta thi ki teri ye aadat itni jldi hatt jayegi. 
Twinkle twinkle little star,
kabhi nhi nhata mera yaarðŸ˜‚

Mess ke time tere room pe pizza aata tha. Aise lgta tha jaise mess ka nhi, Domino's ka monthly bill pay krta ho.

Talent to sir mein bht hai. Football to bht khelta tha..... Physically and dabbe pe bhi... #Goalkeeper.

Tere saath bitaye har pal bht achhe the. Tu thoda dil ka naram nikla....ðŸ˜‚ Lekin bht achha tha. Har baar mithai le ke aata....  Achha bachha. Besan ke laddu bht yaad aynege. Fir ek din aunty campus aaye aur lag rha tha ki meri hi family aayi hai. Der raat tak baatein karna, aur fir kehna ki Kamboj.... mess ke time utha denaðŸ˜‚ uthane ke ek fayada bhi hota tha.. tera gulaab jamun mil jata thaðŸ˜….

Khud to room se bahar niklta nhi tha ... Kheech k freshers party pe le k jana padta tha. Fir kabhi kabhi tere mna karne par kehna ki teri mummy ko phone kar dunga.... ðŸ¤£ Chal mere saath. 

Last month to hum mil nhi paaye... Chal koi baat nhi.... Milne aaye ge tere paas.

Mithai tayar rakhna... Ab besan ke laddu se kaam nhi chalega ðŸ˜€
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
Simon, Tum hi ho na ho shaam ko beard kaali karvane wale the.... Yaad hai jab sir ne tere ko aisa bola thaðŸ˜‚

Chai jitni marzi de do is bnde ko.... Kbhi mana nhi karega. 

Aur bhai Kamboje.....  Wali teri sound bht yaad aayegi ðŸ˜‚ 

Aur haa.... Blog Mein chutiyapa aur bhi kar skta hai. Bht achhe haiðŸ˜€
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
GST.....bhai hai mera. Aaj se hm GST nhi denge.
Our journey begins at the same time.... chahe mess jana ho, chahe first year ki class, Library, CC mein subah 5 bje bahar aanaa.....mera pehla night out, z-square, Haveli, OAT, Freshers night.... Bht mza aya.
One day we saw saggy balls in LIF 101 class..xD, kbhi nhi bhoolega vo scene. Wing ki bhabhi thi vo. 

Khair Achha laga tera saath, 
Hall 4 and 7 ki canteen....har baar coffee with cheese paratha.
Talent ki kmi nhi sir mein, udghosh Mein chaapa, dept mein DR1, dher sari PORs.
hockey player, gym enthusiast, egg to chahiye hi chahiye, randi Rona bhi bht krte ho, Gyani baba.
Bht enjoy kiya tere saath, Antaragni ki bheed mein chutiyapa karna, naachna.
Ek din to tumne Gazab hi kr diya..... Us din apna pyaar dikhya, crush ka peecha krvaya.... Fir bhi kuch haath na aya. LoL
Isi liye last month tree pe date likhi thi 21/4/21.

Khatirdari bhi bht achhi karta hai bhai..... Day was like.... Egg, chicken, meat, repeat.
Vaise to Bhai ko sufi music pasand hai, lekin composition to extreme level ki. Volume 1 ko bhi peeche chhod diya. congrats for the first song bamb jatt 2.0. Fuse hi uda diya bc. I will search for a singer to release your album.

Cycle dhyaan se chalna.... Agli baar koi nhi ayegi uthane.
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
Bhsdk.... Kitna shareef ban k aya tha au dekhte hi dekhte madarchod bn gyaðŸ˜‚

Bht chutiyapa kiya hum ne aur fir ek din yes plus mein gale mil gyeðŸ˜…

Omegle wali raatein, Among Us, pubg, acads, sis guard ki seeti sun k bhaagna, dulhan ka role, Sab jagah chaapa..... Dassa boyyyy.

First year Antaragni mein tera nagin dance kabhi nhi bhoolega... 
Udghosh mein itna RR kiya tumne. 

Wing party mein jaan bhoojh kar bhand hone ki acting karta tha bhsd wala. Aur ek din to tu sach mein bhand ho gya.

Us din tumne prove kiya ki tum bde madarchod ho.
" Mai madarchod hu jo usse unfriend kiya".....  ðŸ˜…

Tere ye dukh dekh k tumhari mehbooba ke liye shayari likhi....

Jo aaj gye hai nazrein chura kar,
Vo kal taras jayege,
Vo Honge ek din sir tak Paani mein,
Upar se hum baras jayege.


Fir milenge dost...  Kanpur ke momos khaneðŸ’›

Tere bina vo din itna Mazedaar na hota.... 
Punjabi freshers le kar Lohri ki boliyaan.... Fashion TV wali mast thiðŸ˜‚

text:
Apne group ka Sabse sincere and chapu bnda.

Pehli baar hum NCC mein mile. Loose fitting uniform mein muskurata hua chehra... Charlie Chaplin ki tarah ðŸ˜‚
Har Saturday ko attendance lgaane ke baad frooti aur biscuits ki taraf bhaagna.... Kitne Mazedaar the vo pal.

Pehla bnda mila jo labs mein bhi imaandaari se kaam kar raha tha. Baki sab to fraudi hi mile (including me)ðŸ¤£.
Bhai hai to deadline ke just pehle assignment submit karna possible hai. Aur vo GIS wala chutiyapa, jo logo ko camera lgta tha... hamara map tere bina itna achha na ban pata. 

Tu mere liye tutor jaisa hai.... Mere doubts clear karta tha.
Thanks for all thatðŸ™ƒ
DOAA canteen ki chai... tere bina mithaas nhi thi us mein. aur haa... agar akele ja rha to mere liye biscuits le anaðŸ˜„ 

Talent ki kmi nhi sir mein. naachte bhi bht badia ho. Hall 1 ki baraat to yaad hi hogi.... Alag hi enthu mein hi naach rha tha jaise khud ki shaadi hoðŸ˜… (bulana jaroor shaadi mein). 

Fir milenge..... Party karne.
Tab tak ke liye.... Bhagwan tumhara bhla kareðŸ¤˜

author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
The Stock master..... Sandeep Kumar M****.

First year mein tu chadde mein ghoomne nikla,
Second tu apne dept mein ghoomta rha, 
Third tu hmaare saath udghosh mein ghooma, chaapne wala insaan. bht mja aya tere saath. And then came the treat day.
Jis din zoo gye gye us din tumne asli rang dikhya.... Jharkhandi babu... the swagger. 
Final year tu sutta, daru, bear, naach gaana, gravity, puff, ganja le ke ghumta rha....pta nhi kon sa inme se try nhi kiya tumne....XD.....blow back jaroor le lena ek baar aur btana ki kaisa feel krte ho bc. Har nashe ka experience btaya tumne. Aur ek din chhat pe to tumne satellite hi tod dali. Bht Badia, bde heavy driver nikle tum to. Us din tumhari chaman ke saath sagai nhi hui bahut afsos hua. Kya raat thi vo bhi. 
Aalsi insaan, har baar mess jate time uthana padta tha. Nhana to tere bas ke bahar tha. 
Baki tum mein talent to koot Koot kar bhara hua hai. Master of skating club...., #swimmer. 
Mja aya tere saath raat ko ghoomne mein....Kabhi OAT, academic area, kabhi CCD.....
Tera Hello Google bahut yaad ayega bhsdk.

Ab thodi mehnat khud se kar le. Mujhe eco ka minor milna chahiye. LoL
Fir milenge trip pe.....North India. Baraf Bahut pasand hai londe ko.
To be Continued.....
author: Gourav  Kamboj

text:
Pizza boy
First year se Pizza ke sahare hi to jeeta aa rha hai. Lol 
Winters mein to pta hi nhi chalta tha blanket mein tu hai bhi ya nhi.
Among Us wali raatein, roof wali wedding, party mein naachna aur bhaagna, OAT mein dumb charades bht yaad ayenge.
Jo bhand hota tha, uske mje leta tha tu. Heavy driver nikle bc. Chhota packet bda  
Dhmaaka. Tere chakkar mein verma fas gya. 
Last day Teri kahani sun k to mai sainty ho gya.... Bhagwan bhla kre tum dono ka.  Khair, Hyderabad mein abb nayi dhund lena.
Mai sobar hu, but tum se gravity, puff, joint, blowback jaise name pta chal gye mujhe...
Buddy..... love the way you make clouds with those ðŸ˜…

Talent to bht hai tere mein. Bas sahi jagah use kiya kar. 
Squash nd poker boyyyyy

Ae khuda teri adaalat mein meri zamanat rakhna,
Hm rahe ya na rahe, mere dost ko Salamat rakhna.

Fir milenge.... tab tk k liye Khuda hafiz.

text:
"Aur paaji kaise ho... ", teri ye awaaj har baar Sunai deti thi. 
Tere room mein padi bottles dekh k pehli baar to mai hairaan ho gya. Har variety ka taste chahiye tumko. Aur fir tera tease karna ki tum punjabi ho k daru nhi peeteðŸ˜….

Bht enjoy kiya tere saath dept ka safar. Tere Startup ka plan, southern lab canteen ke paas discussion, aur fir kehna ki mere startup mein kaam karegaðŸ˜‚. 
Chaapu boyyy. 

Fir milenge.... Chutiyap karne. Tab tak ke liye good bye.
